title: Leaver Buster
body: I've been placed in a lower priority queue because Leaver Buster has detected that I've been AFK for 5 games. In reality my computer is getting a bit slow and sometimes i have to restart my computer or the client in order to continue playing. Once I have restarted, I always rejoin the game. It doesn't happen very often but Leaver Buster still 'busted' me. Any advice?

replies.body:
If your computer takes longer than 5 minutes to reboot and rejoin the game, then you'll have a leave-marker added to your account.

You should try fixing the problem, which I might be able to help you with.
